comments: Professor Tesdall gives great lectures. He will take time to explain each topic very clearly. Goes through examples with the class. Fair exams if you know what\'s going on in class. If you can handle the homework, you can handle the exams no problem. Would definitely take again. Calc 3 definitely opened my eyes to many of calculus\' applications.

The way he taught made students confuses, he copied out of the book verbatim but didnt really explain how to solve the problems. Frustrating that he was on a students case about attendance but he was excessively late to class himself. Not horrible but I wouldnt take him again.

stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  CARING
comments: One of the best professors in CSI Math Department. Math is not very easy subject if you don\'t study, practice or work hard. Took him for MTH 123 and attended to every class, daily reviewed the work he did in the class and received an "A". It is not an easy A, you have to work for it and earn it. He\'s always there for you, would take him again.

comments: He is very clear and does a great job teaching the material. Unfortunately, calculus 2 is something that you need to study outside of class, too. His tests are what one should expect, and will not be passed without studying the material. You cannot be lazy, and though attendance is not mandatory, you really should go to every class.

comments: Tesdall knows his math. He\'s extremely knowledgeable of upper level math. Here\'s the issue: if you need someone to hold your hand through learning functions, he\'s not for you. I plan on taking him for as many 200-300 level math classes as I can, but if you struggled in MTH030, you might want to look elsewhere. Or be prepared to work, HARD.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: He wasn\'t a bad professor. Taught out of the book, which many people didn\'t like. Gives webwork. His tests are easy because they are like the hws from the syllabus. Just do the hws from the syllabus and you should be fine. He is available to help you at his office with any questions. Just study and you will be ok.
